title: Spiced butternut squash wedges

default: 200g/7oz butternut squash, peeled and cut into wedges

steps: For the squash wedges, place the oregano, turmeric, curry powder and oil into a large bowl. Add the squash and mix well to coat. Place into on a roasting tray and place into the oven to roast for 15 minutes, or until cooked through. Turn the squash occasionally, so that it will brown evenly.
